verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w told|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* princes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*:

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w bind|strong="H0631"\w* \w himself|strong="H5315"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w*: \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* void \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* fulfill \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w promised|strong="H7650"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* \w any|strong="H0802"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w bind|strong="H0631"\w* herself \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* oath, being \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* girl \w in|strong="H3068"\w* age: \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* knew \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w promised|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* oath wherewith \w she|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* soul, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* held \w his|strong="H3068"\w* peace, \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w*:

\w Whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* promised \w and|strong="H6965"\w* swore, \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w fulfill|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* deed.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w immediately|strong="H6965"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w soon|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, gainsaid \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* oaths \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* void, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w promised|strong="H3068"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* hath gainsaid \w it|strong="H0518"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* thing, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* word \w once|strong="H1961"\w* going \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w bind|strong="H0631"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* oath:

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* gainsay \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w give|strong="H8085"\w* whatsoever \w she|strong="H0834"\w* promised.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* soon \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* heareth \w he|strong="H0834"\w* gainsay \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H8085"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* promises \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w words|strong="H8193"\w* wherewith \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w no|strong="H0518"\w* \w effect|strong="H3117"\w*: \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w divorced|strong="H1644"\w*, \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w fulfill|strong="H6965"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wife \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, hath \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* \w herself|strong="H5315"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w vow|strong="H5087"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w*,

\w If|strong="H0834"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* hold \w his|strong="H3605"\w* peace, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* doth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* disallow \w the|strong="H3605"\w* promise, \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* accomplish \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* promised.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* forthwith \w he|strong="H0518"\w* gainsay \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, \w she|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* bound \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w promise|strong="H3068"\w*: \w because|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* gainsaid \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* merciful \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0376"\w* \w she|strong="H6965"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* bind \w herself|strong="H5315"\w* \w by|strong="H0632"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w*, \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w by|strong="H0632"\w* fasting, \w or|strong="H0376"\w* abstinence \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w it|strong="H6965"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* depend \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, whether \w she|strong="H6965"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H6965"\w*, \w or|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H6965"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* hold \w his|strong="H3605"\w* peace, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* defer \w the|strong="H3605"\w* declaring \w his|strong="H3605"\w* mind till \w another|strong="H0376"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w vowed|strong="H5088"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* promised, \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w fulfill|strong="H6965"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w immediately|strong="H6965"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* held \w his|strong="H3605"\w* peace.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* gainsay \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* knew \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H5771"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w her|strong="H0518"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w laws|strong="H2706"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6680"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w but|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w girl|strong="H1323"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* age, \w or|strong="H0001"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* abideth \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.
